content: **knitted acorn and oak leaf/christmas decoration in drops daisy theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #dropswinterwoodland drops design pattern da-054 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** acorn circumference = 9 cm height = 8 cm oak leaf length 11 cm width = 6 cm **yarn** drops daisy from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g colour 11 light nougat 50 g colour 12 caramel 50 g colour 13 almond 50 g colour 14 brown 50 g colour 17 moss green 50 g colour 26 sage green and use a left-over drops glitter colour 01 gold for loop 1 acorn weighs approx 5 g without wadding 1 leaf weighs approx 3 g **accessories** wadding **needles** drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm **knitting gauge** 22 stitches in width and 30 row in height with stocking stitch on needle size 3 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm note remember the needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get to few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
